name: Kenning Jean-Paul García
bio: Kenning Jean-Paul García is the author of OF: What Place Meant (2019) and Slow Living (2016), as well as the experimental/speculative epics ROBOT: The Waste Land Re-Imaged and Yawning on the Sands. Xe is a cronista, humorist, performer, and antipoet originally from Brooklyn, New York, but currently residing in Albany. Xe is also an editor for Rigorous.
